Tenses & Verb Forms.question: Choose the correct tense: 'She ___ to the store yesterday.'
Identify the verb tense: 'I have been studying all night.'
Which sentence uses the past perfect correctly?
options: She had eaten dinner before he arrived.
Tenses & Verb Forms.answer: She had eaten dinner before he arrived.

Tenses & Verb Forms.question: What is the future perfect tense of 'They finish the project'?
options: They will be finishing the project.
They will have finished the project.
Tenses & Verb Forms.answer: They will have finished the project.

Tenses & Verb Forms.question: Which sentence is in the present continuous tense?
Identify the correct verb form: 'They ___ here since morning.'
Which verb tense is used in this sentence: 'By next year, I will have graduated'?
Choose the correct verb form: 'He ___ already eaten.'

Prepositions & Phrases.question: Choose the correct preposition: 'The book is ___ the table.'
Fill in the blank: 'He apologized ___ being late.'
Select the correct preposition: 'She arrived ___ the airport on time.'
Which sentence contains a place-based prepositional phrase?
options: The cat slept under the table.
Prepositions & Phrases.answer: The cat slept under the table.

Prepositions & Phrases.question: Fill in the blank: 'They walked ___ the park together.'
Choose the correct option: 'The manager was angry ___ the mistake.'
Select the right preposition: 'He lives ___ his parents.'

Sentence Correction & Transformation.question: Identify the error: 'She don’t like coffee.'
Which sentence is correctly transformed into passive voice?
options: The cake was baked by Mary.
Was the cake by Mary baked.
Sentence Correction & Transformation.answer: The cake was baked by Mary.

Sentence Correction & Transformation.question: Combine the two sentences correctly: 'He is smart. He is lazy.'
options: He is smart but also lazy.
Sentence Correction & Transformation.answer: He is smart but also lazy.

Sentence Correction & Transformation.question: Correct the sentence: 'He didn’t went to school.'
What’s the correct transformation? 'She sings well.' → Passive Voice
options: This sentence can't be changed to passive.
Sentence Correction & Transformation.answer: This sentence can't be changed to passive.

Sentence Correction & Transformation.question: Identify the correct sentence.
options: He has went to the market.
He has gone to the market.
Sentence Correction & Transformation.answer: He has gone to the market.

Sentence Correction & Transformation.question: Combine: 'It rained. We stayed home.'
options: Because it rained, we stayed home.
It rained, so stayed home we.
Sentence Correction & Transformation.answer: Because it rained, we stayed home.

Sentence Correction & Transformation.question: Fix the sentence: 'Their going to the mall.'
Choose the correct transformation: 'He can play the piano.' → Passive Voice
options: The piano can be played by him.
He is can play the piano.
The piano played can be by him.
Sentence Correction & Transformation.answer: The piano can be played by him.
